channel.title: Oracle Identity Governance on Oracle Fusion Middleware on Kubernetes
channel.description: Recent content in Oracle Identity Governance on Oracle Fusion Middleware on Kubernetes

item.title: Release Notes
item.description: Review the latest changes and known issues for Oracle Identity Governance on Kubernetes. Recent changes Date Version Change November, 2021 21.4.2 Supports Oracle Identity Governance domain deployment using WebLogic Kubernetes Operator 3.3.0. Voyager ingress removed as no longer supported. October 2021 21.4.1 A) References to supported Kubernetes, Helm and Docker versions removed and replaced with Support note reference. B) Namespace and domain names changed to be consistent with Enterprise Deployment Guide for Oracle Identity and Access Management in a Kubernetes Cluster.
